Wednesday

Aggregation

  • Basic joins
  • Filter on aggregate vs. raw values
  • Show how joins work
    • Join main table to species table
    • Show species and scientific name side by side
    • Show distinct

Joins

Friday

Missing data

Nesting queries

SELECT yr, COUNT(period)
FROM (SELECT yr, period FROM PortalMammals_main GROUP BY yr, period)
GROUP BY yr;
